column5: Hey folks...Quick question. I'll be heading up to Eagle Lake this weekend for my 3rd time,usually around the same time every year. The lake is huge and although I'm getting to learn it and have done pretty well with other species, I have yet to figure out where the trophy sized walleyes can be caught at this time of year. Though the lake is known more for number than size, I know there are a few out there. If anyone who has had success at Eagle can give me a few spots, fishing patterns or seasonal movements I'd really appreciate it.ThanksDB
